    public class MainActivity
extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
    MainActivity holds the calendar and the main functions of this app

      This method fetches the result from the AddMedicineActivity and MedicineDetailsActivity.
      protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState) 
      void onDestroy()
      Also upon destroying the application the saved medicine will be saved to the sharedPreferences.
      void onResume()
      This method is called when the user returns from any of the activities back to the main activity and will update the UI to match latest changes.
      void onStop()
      Upon closing the app, this method will save the medicine to the sharedPreferences.
      void RefreshList()
      This method holds a loop that deletes everything form the temporary list and adds the medicine that have the same date as the currently selected date.
      void SaveMedicineSharedPreferences()
      This method creates a list to hold all the information about the saved medicine of the singleton list and then saves the newly created list to a string that uses the gson library.

      This method sets the adapter so that the list will update.

        public MainActivity()

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Overrides:
        onCreate in class androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity

      • addMedicine

        public void addMedicine(android.view.View v)
        This method is called when the user clicks on the add medicine button. Starts the AddMedicineActivity where the user can add new medicine.
        Parameters:
        v - used for finding something in the screen view (View)

      • onActivityResult

        protected void onActivityResult(int requestCode,
                                int resultCode,
                                android.content.Intent data)
        This method fetches the result from the AddMedicineActivity and MedicineDetailsActivity. After the user has returned from an activity a toast will display what updates were made.
        Overrides:
        onActivityResult in class androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity
        Parameters:
        requestCode - the code that is used to request the activity (int)
        resultCode - the code that is given in the setResult in the other activity (int)
        data - the data which is passed to the mainActivity from the other activity (Intent)

      • setAdapter

        public void setAdapter(java.util.ArrayList<Medicine> theList)
        This method sets the adapter so that the list will update. A temporary list used rather than the actual list to host elements from the singleton temporarily depending on the selected day.

      • RefreshList

        public void RefreshList()
        This method holds a loop that deletes everything form the temporary list and adds the medicine that have the same date as the currently selected date.

      • SetOpeningView

        public void SetOpeningView()
        Setting the current date to the current date variable (String)

      • SaveMedicineSharedPreferences

        public void SaveMedicineSharedPreferences()
        This method creates a list to hold all the information about the saved medicine of the singleton list and then saves the newly created list to a string that uses the gson library. This string is then put into the sharedPreferences and committed.

      • nuclearButton

        public void nuclearButton(android.view.View v)
        This method is only used for testing purposes. This method will deleted every medicine in the singleton list and cancel all alarms. A clear all button.
        Parameters:
        v - used for finding something in the screen view (View)

      • onResume

        public void onResume()
        This method is called when the user returns from any of the activities back to the main activity and will update the UI to match latest changes. This method also saves the medicine to the sharedPreferences.
        Overrides:
        onResume in class androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity

      • onStop

        public void onStop()
        Upon closing the app, this method will save the medicine to the sharedPreferences.
        Overrides:
        onStop in class androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity

      • onDestroy

        public void onDestroy()
        Also upon destroying the application the saved medicine will be saved to the sharedPreferences.
        Overrides:
        onDestroy in class androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
